title: Screenshot
body: Wow... so I got a 20 minutes lower priority queue because of the new client. First of all, I know that you click cancel, and then reconnect which is simple and I have done it. But on rare occasion it won't reconnect so I have to fully restart my client. Today, I had to restart the whole client and it would pop up with the League Of Legends logo and then never load until it pops up with a white screen saying some weird thing along the lines of "Unable to connect to url league of legends" or something like that and eventually I have to restart my computer and so I get an AFK count to eventually get a leaver buster. I think it's really dumb that I now have to wait 5 games of 20 minutes because if this issue soooooo yeah.

replies.body:
What you experienced is *unrelated* to the known issue of having to hit *cancel* and then *reconnect* inside the client. Overall, many of the issues you mentioned are typical to an *unstable connection* to the servers. I'd like you to ensure all your local network settings are in good standing by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if this helped!
